content: groot by clare heesh https //53stitches com the most recent version of this pattern can always be found at https //53stitches com/ groot/ if you spot any errors or have any questions about the pattern get in contact with me at etsy https //53stitches etsy com on the website https //53stitches com/contact or email hello@53stitches com i will do my best to reply as soon as possible groot | https //53stitches com 1 of 8 materials 2 x 8 00 mm safety eyes green yarn scissors brown yarn polyester filling stitch marker white yarn 3 00 mm crochet hook sewing pins the yarn i use is an 8ply or dk weighted yarn with a gauge of 22 stitches x 30 row techniques and abbreviations this pattern comes with a 20 page photo tutorial techniques guide all page references refer to that guide you can also find these guides or download a copy at my tutorials page https //53stitches com/category/tutorial/ head to page 2 of the guide for a more in depth description on how to read my patterns chain = chain page 6 st = stitch/stitches slip_stitch = slip_stitch page 11 single_crochet = single_crochet page 9 magic_ring = magic_ring page 7 increase = increase 2 single_crochet in the same stitch page 9 decrease = invisible decrease page 10 4sc popcorn = popcorn with 4sc worked into it page 15 single_crochet increase x 2 = repeat stitches within square brackets 2 times i e single_crochet increase single_crochet increase ct brown = change to brown yarn the stitches after this instruction will be in brown see page 17 for how to change colours this pattern is worked in continuous rounds and i suggest using a stitch marker to help you mark the first stitch of each round i like to use bobby pins since they re cheap easy to use and usually on hand at the end of each round just move the bobby pin onto the loop that s currently on your hook you cannot resell any part of this pattern you may do anything you want with the items made from it - including selling them yourself if you do please include a link back to the pattern listing on etsy groot | https //53stitches com 2 of 8 head 1 in brown magic_ring 6 6 2 increase x 6 12 3 increase single_crochet x 6 18 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet 2 increase x 5 single_crochet 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 x 6 30 6 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 4 increase x 5 single_crochet 2 36 7-13 single_crochet 36 36 14 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 decrease x 5 single_crochet 2 30 15 decrease single_crochet 3 x 6 24 16 single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 decrease x 5 single_crochet 18 at this point make sure that you have the correct side on the outside of the doll see page 20 of your techniques guide once you ve done that you want to insert your 8 00mm safety eyes between row 9
